references.paper_title: Representation learning: A review and new perspectives
references.reason: This paper provides foundational context for representation learning, a core concept underlying the zero-shot transfer approach in the main paper.
This paper introduces neural ODEs, a crucial component of the proposed method, providing the theoretical basis for learning and using neural ODEs to represent dynamic systems.

references.paper_title: Zero-shot reinforcement learning via function encoders
references.reason: This paper introduces the theory of function encoders and provides a related method applied to reinforcement learning, which is directly leveraged and extended in the current work for zero-shot transfer of neural ODEs.

references.paper_title: Discovering governing equations from data by sparse identification of nonlinear dynamical systems
references.reason: This paper presents methods for discovering governing equations from data using sparse regression, providing a relevant context for learning dynamical systems from limited data, which is a core challenge addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: MuJoCo: A physics engine for model-based control
references.reason: This paper introduces the MuJoCo physics engine, a key tool used for the robotic experiments in this paper, providing the simulation environment for evaluating the performance of the proposed approach.
